template: We have an image with these objects: ['dog', 'chain', 'collar', 'leaves', 'ground', 'shoe', 'leg', 'jeans', 'foot', 'toe', 'ankle', 'leg', 'foot', 'toe', 'ankle', 'leg', 'foot', 'toe', 'ankle', 'leg']. Generate a caption based only on these objects.

Give minimal hints only.
